mapper.insert: insert into todo values (seq_todo.nextval, #{empNo}, #{tImport}, sysdate, default, #{tContent}, null, #{tTitle})
mapper.select: select count(*) from todo where (TDONE between trunc(sysdate)-7 and trunc(sysdate)+1) and empno=#{empNo} and TSTATUS ='D' OR (TDONE between trunc(sysdate)-7 and trunc(sysdate)+1) and empno=#{empNo} and TSTATUS ='R'
select max(tno) from todo where empNo=#{empNo} and tImport=#{tImport} and tContent =#{tContent} and tTitle=#{tTitle} and TDONE is null
